name: WP Super Secure and Fast htaccess
author: Andrea Pernici

sections.description:
This essential .htaccess rules plugin allow you to improve security and speed of your wordpress blog.

More info:

  • More info on WP Super Secure and Fast htaccess, with info on how to configure it.
  • Check out the other WordPress plugins by the same author, and read his blog: Andrea.
  • Special Thanks to Salserocafe Article Marketing for support.

Changelog

1.0.0

  • first release
sections.installation:
Download, Upgrading, Installation:

Upgrade

  1. First deactivate WP Super Secure and Fast htaccess
  2. Remove the wp-super-htaccess directory

Install

  1. Unzip the wp-super-htaccess.zip file.
  2. Upload the the wp-super-htaccess folder (not just the files in it!) to your wp-contents/plugins folder. If you’re using FTP, use ‘binary’ mode.

Activate

  1. In your WordPress administration, go to the Plugins page
  2. Activate the WP Super Secure and Fast htaccess plugin and a subpage for Super htaccess will appear in your Options menu.

If you find any bugs or have any ideas, please mail me.

Advanced Users

For advanced use of the plugin, see the WP Super Secure and Fast htaccess page on Andrea
sections.faq: Please before asking question read post and comments here http://www.andreapernici.com/wordpress/wp-super-secure-and-fast-htaccess/
